name: Parasite Invasion
description:
Description

Simple Space shooter game that can be controlled by only using a mouse.

  • Gather power-ups before the parasites steal them away: 
    • The white power up recovers bullets;
    • The red power-up recovers health;
    • The yellow power-up doubles your points for a certain amount of time.
  • The more points you gather the stronger your ship becomes.
Controls
  • Mouse to move;
  • Left Mouse Button to shoot.
